attributes.action: prevent the closure of Barnsley Sexual Abuse & Rape Crisis Helpline (BSARCH)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BSARCH has been providing specialist support services to people in the South Yorkshire town of Barnsley whose lives have been affected by sexual violence for over 20 years. And now it faces possible closure due to lack of funding. This work is vital and it is both a tragedy that the volunteers and staff at BSARCH find themselves in this situation and a disgrace that their services are not mainstream funded.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent the closure of Barnsley Sexual Abuse & Rape Crisis Helpline (BSARCH)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21072


Prime Minister's Office
